user_query: My company is considering upgrading our technology infrastructure and we need to analyze the financials of potential vendors. Can you retrieve the balance sheet and financial details of companies in the technology industry for the past five years? It would also be helpful to see any upgrade and downgrade history for these companies. Thank you!

TaskList.description: Identify technology companies for financial analysis.
Retrieve balance sheets of identified technology companies for the past five years.
Retrieve financial details of identified technology companies for the past five years.
Collect upgrade and downgrade history for these technology companies.
